owner_react_emojie.description: put one emojie for owner reacts

BUSINESS_MODE.description: If your deploying bot in WhatsApp Bussinus then make it 👉🏻 true

MENU_IMAGE.description: put image url,url 👈🏻 like this as much as you want for menu image or leave it blank for default images

DATABASE_URL.description: put mongodb or postgres or princedb database url for bots better performance

ANTI_LINK.description: it will dlt links and kick user

AutoReaction.description: make it true to react on chats

autoreactions_emojies.description: put your favourite emojies for AutoReactions on chats or make it empty for all default emojies

VAR_APP.description: put same app name you entered above

VAR_KEY.description: put heroku key click on accounts scroll down copy that key past here

STATUSVIEW.description: make it true to auto view status and likes

StatusLikes.description: make it true to auto likes on status

StatusEmojies.description: Add your favorites emojies for status likes

STATUS_MSG.value: Your Status has been seen by Prince bot

REJECTSCALLS.description: type in truemsg get call reject with message or just make it true to only reject the call

CALLMSG.value: For now calls are restricted by my owner

ANTIFAKE_USERS.description: Add numbers to a variable. The bot will remove users from the group for these numbers. If a number isn’t in the variable, the bot will not take any action. To target all numbers, use this format: 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9.
